title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset their password by navigating to Settings > Security > Reset Password. Click the 'Reset Password' button, enter your current password, then enter and confirm your new password. Password must be at least 8 characters with one uppercase letter and one number.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are allowed within 7 days of purchase. To request a refund, go to Orders > Select Order > Request Refund. Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days. Digital products are non-refundable after download.

title: Account Setup
content: To create an account, click 'Sign Up' on the homepage. Enter your email, create a password, and verify your email address. You can also sign up using Google or GitHub OAuth. After verification, complete your profile by adding your name and preferences.

title: Billing & Subscription
content: We offer three plans: Free, Pro ($9.99/month), and Enterprise ($29.99/month). You can upgrade or downgrade anytime from Settings > Billing. Pro includes priority support and advanced features. Enterprise adds team management and API access.

title: Contact Support
content: You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com or through the in-app chat. Support hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST. Enterprise customers have access to 24/7 priority support.

title: Data Privacy
content: We take data privacy seriously. All data is encrypted at rest and in transit. You can export your data anytime from Settings > Privacy > Export Data. To delete your account and all associated data, go to Settings > Privacy > Delete Account. Deletion is permanent and irreversible.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
content: Enable 2FA from Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication. We support authenticator apps (Google Authenticator, Authy) and SMS verification. 2FA adds an extra layer of security to your account. Backup codes are provided during setup.

title: API Documentation
content: API access is available on Enterprise plans. Generate your API key from Settings > Developer > API Keys. Rate limits are 1000 requests per minute. Full API documentation is available at docs.example.com/api. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication.

title: Team Management
content: Enterprise users can manage teams from Settings > Team. You can invite members by email, assign roles (Admin, Editor, Viewer), and create departments. Admins can manage billing, Editors can create content, and Viewers have read-only access.

title: Notifications
content: Manage your notification preferences from Settings > Notifications. You can choose to receive notifications via email, push notifications, or in-app. Set quiet hours to pause notifications during specific times. Critical security alerts are always sent regardless of preferences.
